name: Windows 95
description: Classic 8-bit gray UI with the iconic retro desktop feel.

name: Windows XP
description: The nostalgic Bliss-inspired blue taskbar and green start button.

name: Windows Vista
description: Glossy Aero glass effects and high-shine gradients.

name: Windows 7
description: Refined transparency and the peak of the Aero design era.

name: Windows 10
description: Modern flat design with clean lines and semi-transparent tiles.

name: Notepad
description: A cozy yellow notepad with hand-drawn doodle message vibes.

name: Rainy Day
description: A cozy windowpane view with stormy atmospheric backgrounds.

name: Cyberpunk Maelstrom

name: Cyberpunk Rockerboy

name: Cyberpunk Aldecaldos

name: Cyberpunk NCPD

name: Cyberpunk Netrunner
